CompoundIndexLimit.Message: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore supports a maximum of 32 fields in a compound index. You would need to reduce the number of fields in the compound index.

CaseInsensitiveIndex.Message: Case insensitive indexes are not supported in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore

Geospatial2dIndex.Message: Geospatial 2d indexes are not enabled by default on Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore. Please enable the capability on your account before migration.

Geo2dSphereIndex.Message: Geospatial 2d sphere indexes are not enabled by default on Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore. Please enable the capability on your account before migration.

GeoHaystackIndex.Message: GeoHaystack indexes are deprecated and are not supported in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore.
